articles.title: Poco M3 officially teased, expected to launch in India soon - TechnoCodex
articles.description: NEW DELHI: Poco is all set to launch its first smartphone of the year in India. The company is expected to launch the Poco M3 in the country soon. The company has now released a teaser video of the upcoming smartphone on its official YouTube channel.

articles.title: Microsoft Surface Laptop Go review: The compact notebook for writers and journalists - The Indian Express
articles.description: The fact that it’s small and lightweight, and also has a full-size keyboard, and is powerful enough to get the work done makes the Surface Laptop Go winner for writers and journalists.
